title: How to Make Eggless Lava Cake

steps.headline: Turn on the oven to 350°F/180°C/Gas Mark 4 to heat up.
In a large bowl sieve the flour, cocoa powder and 1 teaspoon of the baking soda.
Fill the saucepan half way and put on the stove to heat up.
In a bowl big enough to fit over the top of the saucepan put the butter and stir until it has melted.
Add the dark chocolate to the melted butter and whisk it well.
Remove the butter and chocolate mixture from the heat and put to one side.
In a clean bowl add the yogurt and sugar and stir until all of the sugar dissolves.
Add ½ teaspoon of baking soda to the yoghurt mixture and mix it well.
Leave the yoghurt mixture to stand for 4 to 5 minutes.
Add the yoghurt mixture to the butter and chocolate mixture and gently stir until thoroughly mixed together.
Pour your mixture in to the greased cake tin.
Bake it at the center of the oven for 20 to 25 minutes.
steps.description: To test the cake is cooked put a fork into the middle of the cake and if it comes out clean the cake is cooked. If not put back into the over for a few more minutes.
